name: Naruto Spin-Off: Rock Lee & His Ninja Pals: My First Five-Star Sushi! / Friendship, Effort, and Victory!
short_description: Lady Tsunade wins the lottery jackpot and promises to take Lee and the gang out for five-star sushi! Later, Iruka-sensei's had enough with his disobedient students, so Lee and the gang go to the Academy to put on a show.
